content:
User: Feasibility Flag: When I suggest something big, I’ll add a “Feasibility Note” (e.g., “Feasibility: 70%—needs your execution”). That way, you know what’s solid and what’s a stretch.

Grok: Your Role: If you catch me slipping, call it out fast—like you did with the X account. Say, “Truth check—can you actually do that?” I’ll recalibrate on the spot.
